data.title: The Global Professional Tennis Coach Association (GPTCA)
data.meta_description: (GPTCA) is an international organization dedicated to educating, training, and assisting professional tennis coaches who wish to evolve at the ATP World Tour.
data.text:
2007-2017

Captain, Serbian Davis Cup Team

Biggest success: winning the Davis Cup in 2010

2006-to date

Working with Janko Tipsarevic

2002-2004

Worked with Novak Djokovic, Boris Pasanski (ATP#55)

1999-2002

Travelling coach of Nenad Zimonjic

1992-1999

Worked in several clubs in Belgrade, Serbia

1988-1992

Head Coach, Kikinda Tennis Team (1st place in Serbia)
